review.reviewBody: The bread is great and fresh. Will definitely order again
Freaking delicous! Iced Coffee with the Grilled Beef Ribs and Rice 😚
My first time ordering here. Everything was tasty. Had the beef steak pho and spring rolls. Will order again from here.
Food is always really fresh and tasty - always happy I ordered from here
missing our V8. Grilled Pork Chops, Fried Egg with Vermicelli  and the drinks U1. Iced Coffee with Milk and fresh U9. Fresh Mango Smoothie came spilled
